```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
# SECTION 3

# create and store functions
fx <- expression(x^2)
Pa <- expression(2 *(3 *a + 2)^4 - 5)

# find the derivatives of the functions
df_dx <- D(expr =  fx, name = "x")
dP_da <- D(expr = Pa, name = "a")

### find the slope at each point x = 3, a = 1.2

# storing the specific values
x <- 3
a <- 1.2

# evaluating the derivative for the slope
x_3 <- eval(df_dx)
a_1.2 <- eval(dP_da)

```
